title: Just an idea
creator_credit: Guy Blanchard, James Mellor, Editorial Film Productions and Central Office of Information
brief_description: The many sources of technical information available to British industry, including research associations, technical libraries, and the constituent organisations of the Department of Scientific and Industrial Research. The film illustrates how the owner of an engineering firm solves a production problem with the help of valuable technical information obtained from these sources.
creator_credit_for_label: Guy Blanchard, James Mellor, Editorial Film Productions and Central Office of Information
